  • Method Details

    • init

      void init()
      Initializes the storage file service.

    • storeFile

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,String>> storeFile(String serverAuth, long userId, org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file)
      Stores a given file in the storage under a given bucket and directory.
      Parameters:
      serverAuth - The authentication token of the master server.
      userId - The user id of the user the file belongs to.
      file - The file to store
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity<Map<String, String>>

    • deleteFile

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,String>> deleteFile(String serverAuth, long userId, String filePath)
      Deletes a file from a user bucket
      Parameters:
      serverAuth - The authentication token of the master server.
      userId - The user id of the user the file belongs to.
      filePath - The path of the file.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity<Map<String, String>>

    • loadFile

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.core.io.Resource> loadFile(String serverAuth, long userId, String filePath)
      Loads a file from a user as a resource.
      Parameters:
      serverAuth - The authentication token of the master server.
      userId - The user id of the user the file belongs to.
      filePath - The path to the file.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity<Map<String, String>>
